hints.content:
Each bill has a different value.

Dollar name | Picture | Value
- | - | -
One dollar bill | ![](https://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-images/526e9b19f2c39d0d908b6c531d510186f6e93e97.png) | $\$1$
Five dollar bill | ![](https://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-images/5069901d0226c2c5f1c3e73b2b5d7e48ee1e1eee.png) | $\$5$
Ten dollar bill | ![](https://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-images/35b0286a92e1825d39af39b5e362e5d9674eb00d.png) | $\$10$
Twenty dollar bill | ![](https://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-images/66f0febd8ba41a0e3413f72b2f1fc2d54a3819de.png) | $\$20$

Which bill matches the image?

Let's find out how much money Mandy earned for babysitting.

![](https://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-images/234c6d44d0c4450f758afc2b6a2017f7c7a7ed76.png)

$\underbrace{\$\goldE{20} + \$\goldE{20}}_{\goldE{2}{\text{ twenty dollar bills}}} + \underbrace{\$\blueE{1} + \$\blueE{1}}_{\blueE{2}{\text{ one dollar bills}}}= \$42$

Mandy earned $\$42$ babysitting.

Now, let's subtract the amount of money she used to buy her new pair of shoes.

$\underbrace{\$42}_{\text{babysitting money}} - \underbrace{\$18}_{\text{money spent on shoes}} = \$24$

question.content:
Mandy was paid the following amount of money for babysitting over the weekend. 

![](https://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-images/234c6d44d0c4450f758afc2b6a2017f7c7a7ed76.png)

Mandy spent $\$18$ on a new pair of shoes.

**How much money does Mandy have left?**
